title: USC Neuroscientists Use Testimony in Groundbreaking Study of Gratitude (USC Shoah Foundation)
text: ( Source : USC Shoah Foundation ) When someone gives you a gift or does you a favor, what's happening in your brain? That's what researchers from USC's Department of Psychology and Brain and Creativity Institute have just discovered, with the
